effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 750,485 over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 295,997.
Set: Divine Toll applies Insurance! to allies it heals for 8 sec. Divine Toll's cooldown is reduced by 1.0 sec each time you spend Holy Power.

Set: Divine Toll applies Insurance! to allies it heals for 8 sec. Divine Toll's cooldown is reduced by 1.0 sec each time you spend Holy Power.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description: Equip: Your abilities have a chance to call an earthen ally to your aid, supporting you in combat.
Equip: Your spells and abilities have a high chance to Hype you up, granting 378 Haste up to 5 times. Upon reaching maximum Hype, amp it up by 100% for 15 sec before starting again.

name: G3T-00t
description: Complete with shock and bludgeoning capabilities.

name: Frontman's Wondrous Wall
description: It's gonna be the one that saves you.
